articles.content:
Harry Styles has claimed the world record for the most vinyl sales in a week - knocking his ex-girlfriend Taylor Swift off the top spot.

articles.title: Ewan McGregor leads support for costar Moses Ingram after she receives bigoted online messages - Daily Mail
articles.description: McGregor, 51, praised Ingram, 29, as 'a brilliant actor,' 'a brilliant woman' and 'absolutely amazing in this series.'
articles.content:
Ewan McGregor has blasted fans who sent his Star Wars costar Moses Ingram 'horrendous' racist direct messages after the debut of the franchise's series last week.
